title: Did Nancy Belusi offer a border wall in exchange for a complete arms embargo?
subtitle: If it's true, this is our chance to see what happens when an unstoppable force meets an immovable object.
author: David Emery
vclaim: The President of the House of Representatives, who is returning, proposed funding for the construction of the border wall for President Trump in exchange for a bill prohibiting the ownership of firearms by any United States citizen.
